Parameters: The intent to display the +1 confirmation dialog.
onPlusOneClick(android.content.Intent).Description: Called when the +1 button is clicked. Start the intent passed to this method to display the +1 confirmation dialog @B_android#app#Activity_E@ with @B_android#app#Activity#startActivityForResult_E@.

ClassDesc: A listener for +1 button clicks. Implement this interface and call @B_android#app#Activity#startActivityForResult_E@.
